snippet.title: Mixing Suns - Prologue Announcement Trailer | Itch.io
snippet.description:
Mix Drinks. Meet People. Across Dimensions.

A Visual Novel Bartending Simulator. Available for Free on Itch.io - https://mixingsuns.itch.io/mixing-suns

Dimensions are disappearing and people are accepting a new reality. But you’re always welcome at Mahalo, a bar renowned across dimensions for serving the most classic cocktails from Earth of Leungli.

Play as Remy, the Master Mixologist. Mix classic and otherworldly cocktails for patrons of all forms and walks of life. When the night winds down, chat with regulars and make new connections that span dimensions.

• Mix drinks to delight patrons using classic ingredients and out-of-this-world garnishes from Remy's stock!
• Discover new recipes and ingredients!
• Relax and chat with interdimensional travelers to discover their stories!

This game is an alpha version of the prologue. Be a part of Mixing Suns' development process by providing your feedback on our Itch.io Community Board or join our Discord to connect with us directly!

Join our Discord Community - https://discord.gg/EZBTRuq

Check all of our latest - https://linktr.ee/mixingsuns

Follow Mixing Suns on Twitter https://twitter.com/MixingSuns

Follow Mixing Suns on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/mixingsuns/
